title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the age group in the United Kingdom with the largest percentage of women.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a difference between the population distribution in Nigeria and the population distribution in the United Kingdom.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe how gender equity influences population distributions.

For Task D, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about gender equity in the population distributions.

For Task E, the response must correctly explain a future political implication of the population distributions shown.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question.
